name: Sheridan Pilots 307 LLC - Flight School
about: Sheridan Pilots 307 LLC is an FAA-certified Part 61 Flight School located at Sheridan County Airport (KSHR). Founded in May 2020, our mission is to improve access to aviation through dependable flight instruction, consistent access to aircraft, and affordable training. We offer comprehensive fixed-wing and rotor-wing training programs, including private pilot licenses, instrument training, spin/upset, and seaplane lessons. With a team of over 14 instructors, seven aircraft, and two state-of-the-art flight simulators, we provide a robust training environment. We also serve as an FAA-approved PSI testing center for written exams. Our goal is to make aviation accessible to everyone, especially local youth, and we are committed to helping you achieve your aviation aspirations with confidence and safety. Contact us to start your flying journey today.
